title: Engineer
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_happy>>
What's up?
<</Textbox>>

[[I'll see you around|Engineer.Bye]]

[[Do you know anything about $CLUE?|Engineer.Question]]

title: Engineer.Bye
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I'll see you around.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|engineer_neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>

//End of conversation

title: Engineer.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Do you know anything about $CLUE?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|engineer_neutral>>
Oh that? That's supposed to be in $LOCATION.
<</Textbox>>


[[I'll see you around.|Engineer.Bye]]

[[It was in $CRIMESCENE.|Engineer.Questioning]]

[[Are you sure?|Engineer.Upset]]

title: Engineer.Questioning
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found it in $LOCATION. Any idea why?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|engineer_neutral>>
Why would it be in $CRIMESCENE? Was $CREWMATE moving my stuff again?
<</Textbox>>

[[Nevermind. I'll see you around.|Engineer.Bye]]

[[Any thoughts why they would take it?|Engineer.Key]]

[[How is that supposed to help?|Engineer.Upset1]]

title: Engineer.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Are you sure?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|engineer_mad>>
Are you the one who fixes this damn ship?
<</Textbox>>
<<set $EngineerLoyalty to $EngineerLoyalty - 1>>

//End of conversation

title: Engineer.Key
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Any thoughts why they would take it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|engineer_neutral>>
No clue,dude.
<</Textbox>>

[[I'll see you around|Engineer.Bye]]

//Clue Key Dialogue unlocked

title: Engineer.Upset1
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
How is that supposed to help?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|engineer_mad>>
Are you the one who fixes this damn ship?
<</Textbox>>
<<set $EngineerLoyalty to $EngineerLoyalty - 1>>

//End of conversation
